7,8:
turn on
打开

Could you please turn on the light?
你能把灯打开吗?
10:
torch
[tɔrtʃ]
手电筒（英式） 
美式为flashlight

4,5,6,7:
a friend of mine
我的朋友= one of my friends
1,2,3:
It happened to sb.
这事发生在某人身上

It happened to me once.
这事发生在我身上过一次。

7,8:
run away v.
逃跑，迅速离开

He ran away when he saw police.
当他看见警察的时候他逃跑了。
9,10,11,12,13:
as quickly as they could
as  adv.  as sb. can
以某人最...的(做...)

He eats as fast as he can.
他以他最快的速度吃东西。

1,2:
What's up?
什么事？

What's up - why does everyone look so serious?
（发生了）什么事 - 为什么每个人都看起来这么严肃?
7:
call v.
叫喊

"Hey, you! Come over here!" she called.
"嘿，你！过来一下！"她叫着。

1,2,3:
go back to ...
回去继续...

Don't stand there. Go back to work!
别站在那里，回去继续工作！
